mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, nickname, free_chat_times, role, ban, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{freeChatTimes}, #{role}, #{ban}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = IFNULL(#{password},password), email = IFNULL(#{email},email), nickname = IFNULL(#{nickname},nickname), role = IFNULL(#{role},role), free_chat_times = IFNULL(#{freeChatTimes},free_chat_times) WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT role.permission FROM user, role WHERE username = #{username} AND role.role = user.role
select count(1) from user where username = #{username} and ban = 0
select permission from user u inner join role r on u.role = r.role and u.username = #{username}
